# Cicero Web Studio

> A web design and development studio specializing in custom websites, digital marketing, and local SEO services for small businesses in Chicago, Cicero, and surrounding Chicagoland areas.

Cicero Web Studio provides affordable, high-quality web design and development services with a focus on mobile-first design, performance optimization, and local SEO. We help small businesses establish a strong online presence with custom websites, photo/video content, and digital marketing solutions.

## Core Pages

- [Home](https://cicerowebstudio.xyz/): Main landing page featuring services, portfolio, and company information
- [About](https://cicerowebstudio.xyz/about): Information about Cicero Web Studio, our mission, and team
- [Services](https://cicerowebstudio.xyz/services): Detailed service offerings including custom websites, photo/video content, local SEO, and growth bundles
- [Contact](https://cicerowebstudio.xyz/contact): Contact information, social media links, and location details
- [Policy](https://cicerowebstudio.xyz/policy): Privacy policy and terms of service

## Services Offered

1. **Custom Websites**: Custom-built websites from scratch or refreshed to look modern, fast, and conversion-focused. Technologies: React, Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, GSAP. Starting from $2,500.

2. **Photo & Video Content**: Original photo and video content tailored for websites, branding, and local marketing. Technologies: Sony A7 Series, Final Cut Pro, Canva, OBS. Starting from $500.

3. **Local SEO & Visibility**: SEO strategies designed to help local customers find your business online. Technologies: Google Analytics, Google Search Console, Google Business Profile. Starting from $500.

4. **Website Growth Bundle**: Everything you need to launch strong online â€” website, visuals, and visibility working together. Bundle pricing from $3,500.

Cicero Web Studio serves businesses in:
- Cicero, Illinois
- Chicago, Illinois
- Garfield Ridge
- Clearing
- Oak Park
- Elmwood Park
- Portage Park
- Chicagoland area
